The total rain was 2 * 3 inches = <<2*3=6>>6 inches on Tuesday.
The total rain was 0 inches + 1 inch = <<0+1=6>>6 inch across Wednesday and Thursday.
The total rain was 3 inches + 6 inches + 6 inch = <<3+6+6=15>>15 inches on Friday.
There were 3 inches + 6 inches + 6 inch + 15 inches = <<3+6+6+15=30>>30 inches total last week.
30 inches/5 days = <<30/5=6>>6 inches average daily rain.
